-----
[[# About]]
++ __**About:**__
Hello and welcome to my //corps grotesque//, featuring all manner of horrors written by yours truly. If you choose to stay and browse my collected library, I'm certain you'll find something else to sate your appetite.
----
[[# Articles]]
++ __Articles:__

[[module ListPages name="SCP-7948"]]
**[[[SCP-7948]]] -- //[[[SCP-7948|I Don't Care What The Peephole Says!]]]//  -- [%%created_at|%e %B %Y%%] [##green|+%%rating%%##]**
> Whilst details vary upon the nature and behaviour of the entity, all reports universally claim that the only part of the entity visible through the peephole was a single eyeball pressed against the smeared glass.
[[/module]]


[[module ListPages name="SCP-7947"]]
**[[[SCP-7947]]] -- //[[[SCP-7947|Katabasis]]]//  -- [%%created_at|%e %B %Y%%] [##green|+%%rating%%##]**
> I hope you believe me. I honestly hope that you will choose to trust me, my dear friend.
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages name="SCP-7879"]]
**[[[SCP-7879]]] -- //[[[SCP-7879|Book of the Simoom]]]//  -- [%%created_at|%e %B %Y%%] [##green|+%%rating%%##]**
> SCP-7879 refers to an ancient tome organised into 118 chapters of varying length. The title, //Book of the Simoom//, is inlaid in gold Arabic lettering upon a weathered and worn horsehide cover.
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages name="SCP-7831"]]
**[[[SCP-7831]]] -- //[[[SCP-7831|The Ningyo]]]//  -- [%%created_at|%e %B %Y%%] [##green|+%%rating%%##]**
> There is something deeply wrong in Minamata and nobody cares to tell us the truth. Not //Shin Nichitsu//, not the military, not even our own government.
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages name="SCP-6831"]]
**[[[SCP-6831]]] -- //[[[SCP-6831|SKIRTINGBOARDWORLD.]]]//  -- [%%created_at|%e %B %Y%%] [##green|+%%rating%%##]**
> Entities traversing throughout SCP-6831 are subjected to continuous deformations, including bending, folding, stretching, crumpling, and twisting, without exhibiting any signs of external or internal tearing.
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages name="SCP-5213"]]
**[[[SCP-5213]]] -- //[[[SCP-5213|The Oracle of the Fae]]]//  -- [%%created_at|%e %B %Y%%] [##green|+%%rating%%##]**
> //And lo, those three stood alone before Creation and heard its silent anathema; the damnation of all civilisation. The Eternal Oblivion.//
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages name="SCP-5831"]]
**[[[SCP-5831]]] -- //[[[SCP-5831|The Smeerenburg Daemon]]]//  -- [%%created_at|%e %B %Y%%] [##green|+%%rating%%##]**
> SCP-5831 is the rudimentary effigy of an unknown cetacean, constructed almost entirely from the blubber, bones, flesh, and assorted viscera of dead //Balaena mysticetus//.
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages name="SCP-5833"]]
**[[[SCP-5833]]] -- //[[[SCP-5833|With Their Legs Tied Up In Knots]]]//  -- [%%created_at|%e %B %Y%%] [##green|+%%rating%%##]**
> The bulk of SCP-5833 is a large, misshapen lump of human flesh that has become fused with the hay bales and wooden decking of the barn. A pair of appendages are visible at the base of the structure, emerging from beneath the hayloft itself; these appendages resemble a pair of entwined legs.
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages name="SCP-5879"]]
**[[[SCP-5879]]] -- //[[[SCP-5879|Take Me to the Moor]]]//  -- [%%created_at|%e %B %Y%%] [##green|+%%rating%%##]**
> //Suffer Little Children// by //The Smiths// aired continuously on all radio channels available within the region surrounding Saddleworth Moor. The song eventually faded out after two hours of continuous play with the repetition of the song's closing lyrics: "…//on the moor//".
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages name="SCP-5852"]]
**[[[SCP-5852]]] -- //[[[SCP-5852|"You've got teeth in your bugs."]]]//  -- [%%created_at|%e %B %Y%%] [##green|+%%rating%%##]**
> SCP-5852 is the designation given to the anomalous growth of human teeth in specimens of the Superfamily Cicadoidea.
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages name="SCP-5173"]]
**[[[SCP-5173]]] -- //[[[SCP-5173|Aphelion's Rest]]]//  -- [%%created_at|%e %B %Y%%] [##green|+%%rating%%##]**
> CONTENTS OF THE VFR OF PCS APHELION WAKE AWAITS BELOW.
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages name="SCP-4738"]]
**[[[SCP-4738]]] -- //[[[SCP-4738|An Innocent Sin]]]//  -- [%%created_at|%e %B %Y%%] [##green|+%%rating%%##]**
> SCP-4738 is currently contained --in Massachusetts-- ##red|everywhere.##
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages name="SCP-5099"]]
**[[[SCP-5099]]] -- //[[[SCP-5099|The Holy Lance]]]//  -- [%%created_at|%e %B %Y%%] [##green|+%%rating%%##]**
> The //'Patom Crater Conference'// held in 2010 suggested that the crater is of purely geological origin and discredited the idea of it being caused by an astrological impact.
[[/module]]

----
[[# Tales]]
++ __**Tales:**__

[[module ListPages name="drama"]]
**//[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/drama|Alex Thorley in A Dramatic Irony]]]//  -- [%%created_at|%e %B %Y%%] [##green|+%%rating%%##]**
> {{**Department of Unreality, interior-exterior-betweenerior. — dusk, complacency.**}}
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages name="welcome-to-dreamland"]]
**//[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/welcome-to-dreamland|Welcome to Dreamland]]]//  -- [%%created_at|%e %B %Y%%] [##green|+%%rating%%##]**
> //In 1997, only three short years after its grand opening, the doors to Dreamland were closed forever.//
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages name="the-assassins-of-lunakirk"]]
**//[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-assassins-of-lunakirk|The Assassins of Lunakirk]]]//  -- [%%created_at|%e %B %Y%%] [##green|+%%rating%%##]**
> //The New Moon was upon them, a shadowed blot of ink spilling across the night's deep blue sky.//
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages name="underneath"]]
**//[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/underneath|Underneath]]]//  -- [%%created_at|%e %B %Y%%] [##green|+%%rating%%##]**
> //'Under the trees lays the ground, under the ground lay the bodies, under the bodies — lays naught but a shallow, hollow grave.'//
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages name="of-saarn-and-jade-tongues"]]
**//[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/of-saarn-and-jade-tongues|Of Saarn and Jade Tongues]]]//  -- [%%created_at|%e %B %Y%%] [##green|+%%rating%%##]**
> //Great gouts of jade jumped from ship to ship like a mad beast running its own tongue along its teeth after a grisly meal.//
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages name="the-unethical-practices-of-clown-farming"]]
**//[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-unethical-practices-of-clown-farming|The Unethical Practices of Clown Farming (OR: How I Learned That Clowning About Ranches Puts Naughty Clowns Into The Shredder)]]]//  -- [%%created_at|%e %B %Y%%] [##green|+%%rating%%##]**
> **Author's Note:** //The following document is the transcription of a promotional video produced by Clowning About Ranches Ltd. intended to be shown to the most disreputable companies in the clowning industry including Herman Fuller's Circus of Disquieting, Killer Klowns from Outer Space, and McDonald's.//
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages name="the-traitor-s-libel"]]
**//[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-traitor-s-libel|The Traitor's Libel]]]//  -- [%%created_at|%e %B %Y%%] [##green|+%%rating%%##]**
> //'Are you willing to talk yet, Rasmus?' The voice called out over a scratchy intercom.//
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages name="louise-s-photograph"]]
**//[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/louise-s-photograph|Louise's Photograph]]]//  -- [%%created_at|%e %B %Y%%] [##green|+%%rating%%##]**
> //To the memories made in that dreaded yet incomprehensibly beautiful place.//
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages name="indignitas"]]
**//[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/indignitas|Indignitas]]]//  -- [%%created_at|%e %B %Y%%] [##green|+%%rating%%##]**
> **//Click. Clack. Click. Clack.//**
[[/module]]


[[module ListPages name="disillusionment"]]
**//[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/disillusionment|Disillusionment]]]//  -- [%%created_at|%e %B %Y%%] [##green|+%%rating%%##]**
> //He was Jedidiah Springs, the roaming preacher of the Western Seaboard Fifthists.//
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages name="blood-without-forme"]]
**//[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/blood-without-forme|Blood, without Forme]]]//  -- [%%created_at|%e %B %Y%%] [##green|+%%rating%%##]**
> //Her tongue curled loosely and danced across a thousand stars, tracing a slick path of scarlet ichor across a black canvas.//
[[/module]]

----
[[# GoIs]]
++ __GoIs:__
[[=]]
> As of yet, unwritten.
[[/=]]
----
[[# Collabs]]
++ __**Collabs:**__

[[module ListPages name="excerpts-from-the-galileo-deep-space-observatory"]]
**//[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/excerpts-from-the-galileo-deep-space-observatory|Excerpts of Particular Interest From the Galileo Deep-Space Observatory Archives]]]//  -- [%%created_at|%e %B %Y%%] [##green|+%%rating%%##]**
> //The Galileo Deep-Space Observatory, originally founded by Hecate and Artemis as a scientific research assistance project under Trismegistus Translation & Transportation‬ before separating from the company in 2057, is a large lunar facility located approximately 50 kilometers outside the bounds of Galileo. The GDSO's primary purpose is the discovery, documentation, and research of paranormal phenomena observed outside of the Solar System.//
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages name="pepsi-coke-territorial-holdings"]]
**//[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/pepsi-coke-territorial-holdings|PSYCHE Internal Document 75-03718: PepsiCo/Coca-Cola Territorial Holdings]]]//  -- [%%created_at|%e %B %Y%%] [##green|+%%rating%%##]**
> //The following information has been collected from both organizations, and has been prepared into a report below. Compiled with the aid of Dr. Pepper, Foundation Liaison to the GOC for Matters Pertaining to Carbonation Conflict.//
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages name="rate-my-director"]]
**//[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/rate-my-director|Rate My Director]]]//  -- [%%created_at|%e %B %Y%%] [##green|+%%rating%%##]**
> //RateMyDirector is the only website that allows Foundation personnel to anonymously rate your Site Director. Is your SD having you work overtime with threats of Keter Duty? Have they removed the good coffee machines from the researchers' lounges? Or are they a great boss that brings in a cake every birthday? Let your fellow employees know, or check out a Director's page to see ratings left by real personnel!//
[[/module]]
----
[[# Miscellanea]]
++ __Miscellanea:__
Feel free to check out my Twitter where I mostly post about things entirely unrelated to SCP and write enigmatic comments beneath the posts of those whom I wish to consume for sustenance:
